name: Manual Filter Bot
description: An manual filter bot using MongoDB.

ADMINS.description: Username or ID of Admin. Separate multiple Admins by space.

AUTH_USERS.description: ID of users that can use the bot commands

PICS.description: Add some telegraph link of pictures.

LOG_CHANNEL.description: Bot Logs. Give a channel id with -100xxxxxxx

DATABASE_URI.description: MongoDB URI. Get this value from https://www.mongodb.com

DATABASE_NAME.description: Name of the database in MongoDB. Defaults to Cluster1

TG_USER_SESSION.description: A pyrogram user session string. Generate from https://repl.it/@prgofficial/String-Gen

DATABASE_NAME2.description: Your database name from mongoDB. ( Default will 'Cluster0' )

COLLECTION_NAME.description: Name of the collections. Defaults to Telegram_Filters. If you are using the same database, then use different collection name for each bot.
